question: When do the lessons begin?
answer: You can start your course any week. Starting dates for beginners are scheduled every week.

question: How many students are in the class?
answer: The maximum number of students in each class is 10.

question: At what time can I take my lesson?
answer: We offer a flexible schedule. Courses take place either in the morning or in the evening.

question: Will my skill level be available?
answer: Yes, we organize Italian courses of all levels  (beginners, elementary, intermediate and advanced).

question: How do I find my Italian level?
answer: You will take an online placement test. In addition you will be given a short interview. We ensure than you go straight into the right class for you!
